title: "Tough" Sigs
content:
I've been noticing a burst in "Tough" guy, and "Tough" girl, and "Tough" alian sigs... and thought it would be time we all alliad.

The groups:

Tough Guys Wear Pink Society (C'mon - I mean, who hates Keen here) - I guess I'm leading this group, cause I made up the sig first.

Tough Girls Wear Blue Society - Lead by LL

Tough Shikadi Wear Dangly Things Society - Lead by Gal

Tough Yourps Wear Nothing Society - Lead by Lem

Evil Geniuses Wear Black - Leadership up for grabs

Tough Gargs Eat Flesh - Lead by KR... I'd think

And then you can create your own groups. Each Group must come up with rules.

This could make for some really funny posting habits around here.

Example Rules - You must talk with a dutch accent (I Loov Keen Four heez Gruen an Goold Helmut).

Here are the General Rules:

1) You must bear your society in your sig. Don't have a sig yet??? Make one.

Group leaders will offer links to sigs.

2) Anybody who disobeys rules will be ostrigized

Tough Guys Wear Pink Rules:

1) You must use the same avatar I use in my sig, though u can keep your avatar.

2) You must respect ladies (Tough Girls)

3) NO MORT EMOTES!!! They are evil tokens of the Evil Geniuses wear black society

4) You must be cheerful

5) Gimmi $10

6) Rule 5 is optional

8 ) Woops, missed 7, oh well...

9) Be nuteralistic; "The glass is just as empty as it is full"

Well, who's siding with who???Proud Leader of the "Tough Guys Wear Pink" Society
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/LLMod.jpg[/img]
"Tough Guys Wear Pink!!!"
-- NAJAWA --

title: heh
content: Tough modders know where the 'delete' key is, right KeenRush?  :-D

title: Re: heh
content:
Aw... I thought it might be fun...

Darn you all!!!

Get lives!!!

I haven't been on here for 3 days (I have a life)

Geez... well... I guess I was just working on my website instead, though I totally screwed it; me not knowing HTML and all.

Okay... but I am still leader of the Tough Guys Wear Pink Society!!!

All who use my avatar, or any variant of it must comply with my rules... New Rules (Easier):

1) Still no mort... I know is is hard, but that is the rule

2) You must have an I.Q. of 312 (High enough to be keen's friend, but no one here is above keen)

3) You aid me in my infamous plots (Spam KR thinging [used for example only - the KR Spam mission has been over for a while, and won't start for another 3 years... thought the 3 year deadline will only be put into effect if KR doesn't do anything for that amount of time])


That's it for now, unless you guys don't have any fun, and are a group of depressed teens, and young adults...

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-rolleyes.gif[/img] Proud Leader of the "Tough Guys Wear Pink" Society
